title: Year of the Howl
itunes:title: Year of the Howl
description:
Put on your wrist-wrestlin' gear and belly up to the table for this week's show, full of chatter about brain amoebas and Tiny Lister, Neon White (but on PC, seriously), PlayStation Plus Premium and its classic games library, the FF7 Rebirth announcement, Creative Assembly's Hyenas, the ID@Xbox demo fest, and the wasteland's favorite wasteland game, Fallout 5.

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate for versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:08) Wrist Wrasslin'
(00:06:10) Know where you can shove your distilled water? Up your nose.
(00:12:10) Zeus aka Tommy 'Tiny' Lister
(00:12:36) The video games
(00:12:47) Neon White [PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch] on Jun 16, 2022
(00:24:24) First Break
(00:24:28) Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge [Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch] on Jun 16, 2022
(00:36:12) PlayStation Plus and those Classic Games
(00:49:21) Citizen Sleeper [Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch] on May 05, 2022
(00:51:53) ID@Xbox Summer Game Fest Demos
(00:52:55) Terror of Hemasaurus
(00:56:48) Wave Break
(00:57:01) Overpass: Rhythm Roadtrip
(00:58:41) Second Break
(00:58:45) The News
(00:59:18) Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth is official
(01:12:00) Dragon's Dogma 2 is coming?
(01:14:27) Hyenas want to steal your nostalgia
(01:22:09) Tony Hawk Pro Skater 3+4 was canceled
(01:25:28) PlayStation will not attend Gamescom
(01:30:24) Fallout 5 will probably be made... someday
(01:36:54) Looking into the future of 2022
(01:37:48) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:42:47) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(01:44:21) Nextlander upcoming content
(01:45:18) See Ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
